name: ChaosBots
description:
Manage a group of nanobots that are rapidly multiplying out of control! Keep them in check with killbots and limit their growth, otherwise the swarm might overheat!

Try to make your bots survive in this stressful and chaotic population game, while getting assaulted by hacking attacks!

Controls
  • Drag & drop robots - LMB
  • Override green BaseBot - RMB 
Credits

This game was made in 40 hours as part of a university game jam with the jam theme "Override" by:

Team: Meine Favoriten

  • The Fifth King / Discord: The Fifth King#0005 / Programming and Design
  • SpyPlayer / Discord: Marvin#4012 / Programming Lead
  • UsefulCompanion // Character Art and Design
  • Amalia / Discord: Amalia#7728 / UI and Level Design
